#!/bin/bash
filename='~/home/sbp29/R/Projects/ybr/input/longread/samples2align.txt'
echo Start
while read p; do
    minimap2 -ax splice -k14 -uf /home/aar75/GCF_000146045.2_R64_genomic.fna "/home/aar75/rna_seq/longreads/nanopore_ybr/20220819/${p}.fastq.gz"  > "/home/aar75/rna_seq/longreads/nanopore_ybr/20220819/${p}.sam";
    samtools view "${p}.sam" -bh -t /home/aar75/GCF_000146045.2_R64_genomic.fna -F 2308  > "${p}.bam";
    samtools sort -@ 25 "${p}.bam" -o "${p}.bam";
    samtools index "${p}.bam";
    bedtools bamtobed -i "${p}.bam" > "${p}.bed";

done < $filename
